      • nextPosition

        public void nextPosition(SimulationController controller)
        Calculates the next position of the simulation object(Soldier or zombie) If the next position is out of bounds, changes direction and the simulation object does not move. If the next position is not out of bounds, the simulation object is moved to the next position
        Parameters:
        controller - simulation controller

      • step

        public abstract void step(SimulationController controller)
        abstract step function
        Parameters:
        controller - simulation controller
